name: BlockBuilder 3D - My Minecraft clone.
description:
My Minecraft clone!

WASD move, LMB break/attack, RMB place/attack, SPACE jump, NUMBER KEYS select item in Hotbar, SCROLL select item in Hotbar

It's under development right now. Also playable here:

https://www.akncreations.com/BlockBuilder3D-1.3.3/BlockBuilder3D-1.3.3/index.htm...
